title: Try Out Our Newest Beta Build! H2R Graphics v2.12 Includes Cropping, Monitor Selection & More!
description140: We've crammed new features & improvements in H2R Graphics v2.12 incl. opening outputs on monitors, cropping graphics, & more. Please try the beta build & let us know what you think!
description300: We’ve crammed in a bunch of new features and improvements in H2R Graphics v2.12, including the ability to open outputs on specific monitors, crop graphics, and more. We’d love to hear your thoughts so please give the beta build a go and let us know what you think.
author: Here to Record
